extends java.lang.Object
    The TiWLAN for networkcenter of framework.

      • getSoftAPStaticAddress

        public java.lang.String[] getSoftAPStaticAddress()
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the WLAN softAP static address
        Returns:
        static address or null address[0] local address, for example:1.local, "192.168.1.100"
        address[1] gateWay address, for example:1.gateWay, "192.168.1.1"
        address[2] netMask address[IN], for example:1.netMask, "255.255.255.0"
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiWLAN error occurs

        public java.lang.String[] getStaticAddress()

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • setSoftAPStaticAddress

        public void setSoftAPStaticAddress(java.lang.String localAddress,
                                   java.lang.String gateWayAddress,
                                   java.lang.String netMaskAddress)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Set the WLAN softAP static address, effective at next startup
        Parameters:
        localAddress - local address[IN]
        For example:1.local, "192.168.1.100"
        2.null, static address off
        gateWayAddress - gateWay address[IN]
        For example:1.gateWay, "192.168.1.1"
        2.null, static address off
        netMaskAddress - netMask address[IN]
        For example:1.netMask, "255.255.255.0"
        2.null, static address off
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiWLAN error occurs

      • setStaticAddress

        public void setStaticAddress(java.lang.String localAddress,
                             java.lang.String gateWayAddress,
                             java.lang.String netMaskAddress)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Set the WLAN static address, effective at next startup
        Parameters:
        localAddress - local address[IN]
        For example:1.local, "192.168.1.100"
        2.null, static address off
        gateWayAddress - gateWay address[IN]
        For example:1.gateWay, "192.168.1.1"
        2.null, static address off
        netMaskAddress - netMask address[IN]
        For example:1.netMask, "255.255.255.0"
        2.null, static address off
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiWLAN error occurs

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Shutdown the WLAN, WLAN and WLANSoftAP are shutdown at the same time
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiWLAN error occurs

      • shutdownSoftAP

        public void shutdownSoftAP()
                    throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:

      • startup

        public void startup(int timeout)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Startup the WLAN, connect to the AP with configured parameters
        Parameters:
        timeout - connect timeout[IN], unit:second
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiWLAN error occurs

      • startupSoftAP

        public void startupSoftAP(boolean hidden)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Startup the softAP of WLAN, WLAN must startup first
        Parameters:
        hidden - true:SSID hidden, false:SSID not hidden[IN]
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiWLAN error occurs
